SA20vmvkbh_u:1244: evaṃ vidyā saṃskārā asaṃskṛtaṃ ca tatpratipakṣaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1245: yāvaj jarāmaraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ grāhakaṃ cety antas tannirodho grāhyo grāhako vety anto yena mārgeṇa tan nirudhyate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1247: dvidhā kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣabhedena tatparivarjanārthaṃ madhyamā pratipad vidyā cāvidyā cādvayam etad iti vistareṇa vidyāvidyādīnāṃ grāhyagrāhakatvābhāvāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1254: yasya pratipakṣo jñānaśūnyatā jñānānimittaṃ jñānāpraṇihitaṃ ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1259: punarbhavaprabandhaś ca yasya pratipakṣo jñānājātiḥ jñānānutpādo jñānāsvabhāvatā ca /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1262: jñeyaśūnyatādayo dharmā etena trividhena saṃkleśena yathāyogaṃ yāvan na śūnyatādayaḥ kriyante /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1263: prakṛtyaiva śūnyatādayo dharmadhātoḥ prakṛtyasaṃkliṣṭatvāt tena yadi dharmadhātuḥ saṃkliśyate vā viśudhyate veti kalpayaty ayam antaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1266: yan na śūnyatayā dharmāñ chūnyāṃ karoti /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1267: api tu dharmā eva śūnyā ity evamādi /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1268: aparaḥ saptavidho vikalpadvayāntas tad yathā bhāve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ/
SA20vmvkbh_u:1271: tad etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārtham iyaṃ madhyamā pratipat /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1272: na khalu pudgalavināśāya śūnyatā api tu śūnyataiva śūnyā pūrvāntaśūnyatā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1275: śamane 'pi vikalpo 'nataḥ praheyaprahāṇakalpanayā śūnyatāyās trasanād etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārtham ākāśadṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1276: trāsye 'pi vikalpo 'ntas tataś ca trāsyād bhaye 'pi parikalpitarūpāditrasanāt (/
SA20vmvkbh_u:1278: pūrvako dṛṣṭāntaḥ śrāvakān ārabhyāyaṃ tu bodhisatvān /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1279: grāhye 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ grāhake 'pi etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ māyākāradṛṣṭāntaḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1283: arthābhāve vijñaptyasaṃbhavād ity etad atra sādharmyaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1284: samyaktve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ mithyātve 'pi bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ samyaktvena kalpayato mithyātvena vā etasyāntadvayasya parivarjanārthaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1288_0: jātaś ca tad eva kāṣṭhadvayaṃ dahaty evam asamyaktvalakṣaṇāyā yathābhūtapratyavekṣāyāḥ
SA20vmvkbh_u:1288_1: samyaktvalakṣaṇam āryaṃ prajñendriyaṃ jāyate jātaṃ ca tām eva bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ vibhāvayatīty
SA20vmvkbh_u:1288_2: etad atra sādharmyaṃ na cāsamyaktvalakṣaṇāpi bhūtapratyavekṣā mithyātvalakṣaṇā samyaktvānukūlyāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1290: avyāpṛtāv api jñānasya buddhipūrvāṃ kriyāṃ niḥsāmarthyaṃ vā kalpayataḥ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1293_0: ajanmatve 'pi vikalpo 'ntaḥ samakālatve 'pi yadi pratipakṣasyānutpattiṃ vā kalpayati
SA20vmvkbh_u:1293_1: saṃkleśasyaiva vā dīrghakālatvam etasya vikalpadvayāntasya parivarjanārthaṃ dvitīyas
SA20vmvkbh_u:1297: viśiṣṭā cāviśiṣṭā ca jñeyā daśasu bhūmiṣu /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1298: yasyāṃ bhūmau yā pāramitātiriktatarā sā tatra viśiṣṭā sarvāsu ca sarvatra samudāgacchatīty aviśiṣṭā /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1305: pragamaḥ praśaṭhatvaṃ ca prakarṣālambanaṃ mataṃ // V.28
SA20vmvkbh_u:1307: yad uta dharmaprajñaptivyavasthānālambanaṃ dharmadhātvālambanaṃ sādhyālambanaṃ sādhanālambanaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1314: tatra prathamaṃ ye pāramitādayo dharmā vyavasthāpyante /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1315: dvitīyan tathatā tṛtīyacaturthe te eva yathākramaṃ dharmadhātuprativedhena pāramitādidharmādhigamāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1324: ekādaśam aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau dvādaśaṃ navamyādibhūmitraye tad eva hi prathamadvayaṃ /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1325: tasyān tasyām avasthāyāṃ tattadālambanaṃ nāma labhate /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1347: madhyamāpratipatprakāśanāt madhyāntavibhāgam apy etan madhyasyāntayoś ca prakāśanāt /
SA20vmvkbh_u:1362: sā ca pratipattir yādṛśī paramā / yena ca
SA20vmvkbh_u:1365: yathā yena prakāreṇāvikṣepapariṇatā ca śamathabhāvanayā aviparyāsapariṇatā ca vipaśyanābhāvanayā/
SA20vmvkbh_u:1366: yadarthaṃ ca madhyamayā pratipadā niryāṇārthaṃ / yatra ca
